definition: A term used to describe one of two equal parts into which something can be divided, often used to refer to a portion or share of a whole. It is commonly used in various contexts, such as when discussing fractions, dividing objects, or sharing resources.

examples.german: Die Hälfte der Pizza ist schon gegessen.
examples.english: Half of the pizza has already been eaten.

examples.german: Ich teile mein Eis gerne in zwei Hälften.
examples.english: I like to divide my ice cream into two halves.

examples.german: Die Hälfte der Zeit ist bereits vorbei.
examples.english: Half of the time has already passed.

examples.german: Er hat nur die Hälfte der Aufgabe erledigt.
examples.english: He has only completed half of the task.

examples.german: Die Hälfte der Bevölkerung ist weiblich.
examples.english: Half of the population is female.
